verses.verse: (For the choir director; on stringed instruments. A Psalm of David.) <S%H6030>Answer<s%> me when I <S%H7121>call,<s%> O <S%H430>God<s%> of my <S%H6664>righteousness!<s%> Thou hast <S%H7337>relieved<s%> me in my <S%H9496>distress;<s%> Be <S%H2603>gracious<s%> to me and <S%H8085>hear<s%> my <S%H8605>prayer.<s%>

O <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H376>men,<s%> <S%H4100>how<s%> <S%H5704>long<s%> will my <S%H9202>honor<s%> become a <S%H3639>reproach<s%>? [How long] will you <S%H157>love<s%> <S%H7385>what<s%> is <S%H7385>worthless<s%> and <S%H1245>aim<s%> at <S%H3577>deception<s%>? <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>

But <S%H3045>know<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H6395>set<s%> <S%H6395>apart<s%> the <S%H2623>godly<s%> <S%H2623>man<s%> for Himself; The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H8085>hears<s%> when I <S%H7121>call<s%> to Him.
<S%H7264>Tremble,<s%> and do not <S%H2398>sin;<s%> <S%H559>Meditate<s%> in your <S%H3824>heart<s%> upon your <S%H4904>bed,<s%> and be <S%H1826>still.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>

<S%H7227>Many<s%> are <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4310>"Who<s%> will <S%H7200>show<s%> us [any] <S%H9185>good<s%>?" <S%H5375>Lift<s%> up the <S%H216>light<s%> of Thy <S%H6440>countenance<s%> upon us, O <S%H3068>Lord!<s%>

Thou hast <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H8057>gladness<s%> in my <S%H3820>heart,<s%> <S%H4480>More<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> <S%H6256>when<s%> their <S%H1715>grain<s%> and <S%H8492>new<s%> <S%H8492>wine<s%> <S%H7231>abound.<s%>

In <S%H7965>peace<s%> I will <S%H3162>both<s%> <S%H7901>lie<s%> <S%H7901>down<s%> and <S%H3462>sleep,<s%> For Thou <S%H910>alone,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> dost make me to <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in <S%H983>safety.<s%>
